### Letter of requests sent to Reitoria | Friday, 24 May 2024

A letter with the researcher's requests to make UAlg a more engaged and peace promoting institution has been sent to Reitoria. 

Is is a letter requesting *simple get universal gestures of good-faith* from UAlg as a Peace promoting institution: simple, reasonable and moderated requests, in line with the values that we seek to promote and nurture at UAlg: *Peace, Understanding, Empathy, and Diplomacy*.
Equity and Liberty for all at all times.

The letter can be found in the documents section. 

Thank you to all of those that contributed and signed it.

-UAlg4Peace-
